bwwExcerpt: The new musical, which opens tonight at the Music Box Theatre following a run at the Public downtown, is at its most invigorating when Taub hits on these collisions of the political and personal. But such moments are few and far between in this sprawling historical work, with book, music and lyrics by Taub, which traces the suffragist movement and the battle for a womanâ€™s right to vote in the United States. The show is overburdened by too many characters and too much historical ground to cover,
